attributes.action: Put pressure on the Football Association to sack Steve McClaren and allow the fans to vote on the next England Manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the England football fans are fed up with the F.A. deciding on who should be England Manager. Not since the apointment of Terry Venables in 1994 have we had a manager who has been successful and knows how to manage English players. We the fans demand the opportunity to have a say who should manage our national team.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
